Set this to false if you don't want the mod to add additional arguments to the '/gamemode' command
option.gamemodeoverhaul.enable_gm.toolti: Set this to false if you don't want the mod to add the '/gm' command
option.gamemodeoverhaul.enable_no_args_g: Set this to false if you don't the mod to add '/gmc', '/gms', '/gmsp' and '/gma' commands
option.gamemodeoverhaul.enable_default_g: Set this to false if you don't want the mod to add additional arguments to the '/defaultgamemode' command
option.gamemodeoverhaul.enable_dgm.toolt: Set this to false if you don't want the mod to add the '/dgm' command
option.gamemodeoverhaul.enable_difficult: Set this to false if you don't want the mod to add the integer values for '/difficulty
option.gamemodeoverhaul.enable_toggledow: Set this to false if you don't want to have the mod add '/toggledownfall' back
